org.opendaylight.controller.configuration

Interface IConfigurationServiceCommon

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IConfigurationContainerService, IConfigurationService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurationService, ContainerConfigurationService

    public interface IConfigurationServiceCommon
    Common configuration interface for Configuration Service and Container Configuration Service

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Status persistConfiguration(java.util.List<ConfigurationObject> config, java.lang.String storeName)
      Bundle will call this function to ask Configuration Manager to persist their configurations.
      java.util.List<ConfigurationObject> retrieveConfiguration(IObjectReader reader, java.lang.String storeName)
      Bundle will call this function to ask Configuration Manager to retrieve the configuration identified by the passed store name
      Status saveConfigurations()
      Represent the trigger to save the controller configuration cluster wide.

    • Method Detail

      • saveConfigurations

        Status saveConfigurations()
        Represent the trigger to save the controller configuration cluster wide. When called on IConfigurationService, it will trigger a cluster wide save configuration event for all the global instance components and all components in all containers. When called on IContainerConfigurationService, it will trigger a cluster wide save configuration event for all components in the current container.
        Returns:
        the Status object representing the result of the saving request

      • persistConfiguration

        Status persistConfiguration(java.util.List<ConfigurationObject> config,
                          java.lang.String storeName)
        Bundle will call this function to ask Configuration Manager to persist their configurations. It is up to the Configuration Manager to decide how the configuration will be persisted
        Parameters:
        config - The bundle configuration as a collection of ConfigurationObject
        storeName - The identifier for this configuration
        Returns:
        The Status of the operation

      • retrieveConfiguration

        java.util.List<ConfigurationObject> retrieveConfiguration(IObjectReader reader,
                                                        java.lang.String storeName)
        Bundle will call this function to ask Configuration Manager to retrieve the configuration identified by the passed store name
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader object for parsing the configuration provided by the caller
        storeName - The identifier for the configuration
        Returns:
        The retrieved configuration as a collection of ConfigurationObject
